column4: gtk-gnutella says I'm behind a firewall and I don't have a firewall so how do I fix this so I can use gtk-gnutella?
I am assuming you have a PCI cable modem?
im wondering a couple of things.. firstly. does the cable provider have a box in your house? at the other end of the ethernet cable? theres a good chance that that is a router.
and secondly, it's always possible that your provider is deliberately blocking some P2P?
